history.proof: intros m m' h ns nm Hpt HIn. unfold pt_map_msg in Hpt. unfold filterMap in HIn. destruct nm as [n msg]. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_snd: BaseParams
base_fst: BaseParams
multi_fst: MultiParams base_fst
multi_snd: MultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsPartialMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
fail_fst: FailureParams multi_fst
fail_snd: FailureParams multi_snd
fail_map_congr: FailureParamsPartialMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map
overlay_fst: NameOverlayParams multi_fst
overlay_snd: NameOverlayParams multi_snd

Goal:
forall (m m' : msg) (h : name) (ns : list name) (nm : name * msg), pt_map_msg m' = Some m -> In nm (filterMap pt_map_name_msg (map2snd m' (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h ns))) -> snd nm = m

Premises:
FailureParamsPartialMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailureParams P0 -> FailureParams P1 -> BaseParamsPartialMap B0 B1 -> Prop
Record BaseParamsPartialMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsPartialMap { pt_map_data : data -> data; pt_map_input : input -> option input; pt_map_output : output -> option output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsPartialMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
filterMap = fix filterMap (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (l : list A) {struct l} : list B := match l with | [] => [] | x :: xs => match f x with | Some y => y :: filterMap A B f xs | None => filterMap A B f xs end end : forall A B : Type, (A -> option B) -> list A -> list B Arguments filterMap {A B}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsPartialMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map fail_fst : FailureParams multi_fst fail_snd : FailureParams multi_snd fail_map_congr
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in msg : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments msg {P MultiParams}
pt_map_name_msg = fun (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd) (name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd) (msg_map : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd) (nm : name * msg) => match pt_map_msg (snd nm) with | Some m => Some (tot_map_name (fst nm), m) | None => None end : forall (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd), MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd -> MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd ->
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pt_map_msg = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (MultiParamsMsgPartialMap0 : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap P0 P1) => let (pt_map_msg) := MultiParamsMsgPartialMap0 in pt_map_msg : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), MultiParamsMsgPartialMap P0 P1 -> msg -> option msg Arguments pt_map_msg {B0 B1 P0 P1 MultiParamsMsgPartialMap}
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B1 P0 P1} Arguments Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective [B0 B1 P0 P1] _ (_ _)%function_scope
map2snd = fun (A B : Type) (b : B) => map (fun a : A => (a, b)) : forall A B : Type, B -> list A -> list (A * B) Arguments map2snd {A B}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}
MultiParamsPartialMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsPartialMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgPartialMap P0 P1 -> Prop
MultiParamsMsgPartialMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _

```
intros m m' h ns nm Hpt HIn.
unfold pt_map_msg in Hpt.
unfold filterMap in HIn.
destruct nm as [n msg].
simpl in HIn.
destruct (pt_map_msg msg) eqn:Hmsg; try discriminate.
inversion HIn; subst.
rewrite Hmsg in Hpt.
injection H.
intros; assumption.
```

original: intros m m' h ns nm Hpt HIn. unfold pt_map_msg in Hpt. unfold filterMap in HIn. destruct nm as [n msg]. simpl in HIn. destruct (pt_map_msg msg) eqn:Hmsg; try discriminate. inversion HIn; subst. rewrite Hmsg in Hpt. injection H. intros; auto.
